name: rongin
description: This is a rongin multipurpose theme

scripts.sass-watch: npm run sass-build && npm run sass-build -- -w
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run sass-watch" "npm run serve" --names "ğŸº,ğŸ’„,ğŸŒ" --prefix name
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run gulp" "npm run sass-build" --names "ğŸº,ğŸ’„" --prefix name
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "commit message" && git push origin master

author: Enamul Haque
